JOB DESCRIPTION: We are looking for solid backend(NodeJs) engineers who are experts in JavaScript.    Responsibilities    Integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server side logic      Collaborate with other team members in defining the API.       Write solid code that is performant and manageable       Troubleshoot server side issues       Take part in code reviews     Qualification     B.S in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent       2+ Experience in NodeJs Development       Solid computer science fundamentals      Understanding the nature of asynchronous programming and its quirks and workarounds      Very good working knowledge in user authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments      Basic understanding of front-end technologies, such as HTML5, and CSS3     Creating database schemas that represent and support business processes      Awareness of Object oriented/modular development       Implementing automated testing platforms and unit tests       Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
